cards.flavor_text: [i]“We're our town's last line of defense! We owe it to our families to do what we can.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Discard your hand, then draw a card for each creature you control.

[i]“Rule #1: You can't always do it alone. Even the greatest warriors need help sometimes.”

cards.rules_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text:

—Jack, Monstrous Liaison[/i]

cards.flavor_text:

—Jack, Monstrous Liason[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]Spontaneous combustion, the biggest fear of children around the globe.[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]Lucy was expecting a lot of things on her first ghost hunt. She wasn't expecting the ghosts to apologize for scaring her.[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]The perfect student, give or take an organ or two.[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]“‘Eyes of a newt and the teeth of a rat!?' Can I even find that online?”[/i]

cards.card_name: Ted Moray, Too Old for This
cards.rules_text:
Ward—Pay 3 life.
Whenever an opponent draws a card, they lose 2 life. If they've drawn two or more cards this turn, they also discard a card. If they've drawn three or more cards this turn, they also sacrifice a nonland permanent.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Rex, I have a double shift at Wilson's tomorrow. I can't play pretend with you every day.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Say Cheese! deals X damage to target creature or planeswalker. If you control a creature with a +1/+1 counter on it, it deals X plus 2 damage instead.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Lucy and Carlos stared at the smoldering pile of ash in front of them. “I guess the flash was on.” Lucy said shakily.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever one or more artifacts are put into your graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Corporate jobs can suck the mind and soul out of you.[/i]

cards.flavor_text:
